text:
The sale of model question and answer bank for SSLC and Plus Two students began here on Thursday.

The question bank, prepared by the Tamil Nadu Parent-Teachers Association under the guidance of School Education Department of the State Government, contains questions and answers for all subjects. It facilitates the students to understand the questions and answers easily in order to score good marks.

The question banks are being sold at Syed Murthuza Higher Secondary School.
title: Question bank released
